Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Shenzhen Huawen Film and Television Media Co., Ltd. (referred to as "Shenzhen Huawen Film and Television") was established in 2013. It is a full-media marketing agency based on film and television production, with a core focus on news dissemination both domestically and internationally.

The founding core members of the company are 80% derived from seasoned professionals of Shenzhen Media Group, Hong Kong Huayu Satellite TV, Asia United Satellite TV, among others, and it has signed contracts with a number of experienced directors, cameramen, and post-production special effects personnel. To date, the company has provided services to over 200 large and medium-sized enterprises in China, accumulating nearly 1000 films shot.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The stored data primarily encompasses a wide range of video content, including but not limited to promotional videos, film production materials, micro-videos, and advertisements. This data not only includes the final products but also involves various materials used during the production process, such as high-definition video clips, audio files, animation sequences, special effects resources, and related scripts and storyboards. Additionally, the database may store metadata associated with these video projects, including shooting locations, information on the creative team members involved, the equipment and technical specifications used, providing rich reference materials for subsequent content management and reuse. Such a comprehensive data storage solution ensures that every creative element can be effectively organized, retrieved, and reused, significantly enhancing work efficiency and creative flexibility.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe, Australia (continent)
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
